result.execSummary:
The defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Zacharie Michael Bauer is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Zacharie Michael Bauer was found guilty of resist or obstruct officer. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Final pre-trial on June 1, 2018 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial on June 28, 2018 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Chad A. Hendee appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Mark David Lawton appeared by phone means for Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer.
Atty Hendee states that the parties have been in discussion for possible settlement but the parties will be asking for a trial be set.
Atty Lawton agrees.

BY THE COURT:  Set Jury Trial
bond continued  Jury trial scheduled for June 28, 2018 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 1, 2018 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in court, in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states that the JA was trying to get ahold of Atty Streicher and just got his voicemail.  Atty Hendee states that the Attorney failed to appear for Judge Slate's criminal case as well.  

BY THE COURT: Court will continue this at this time.
Court will continue to try to get ahold of Atty Streicher.

Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in court with attorney Rodman Wells Streicher.  Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states that he has not been able to speak with Atty Streicher on this matter.  Atty Hendee asks that this matter come back to court after the other matter that is set for trial.
Atty Streicher agrees.

bond continued.  Return date scheduled for September 22, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Discovery Demand
Return date on August 3, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
*No special conditions

Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in court, in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Atty Hendee states that bond needs to be set.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.   Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands.  Court finds probable cause to support the charges.

  BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.

  Atty Hendee has no objection to a signature bond with conditions due to the defendant is on a cash bond already.

  BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $1,000 Signature bond with conditions:
  Return date scheduled for August 3, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
